00002 /--------------------------------------------------------------------

00010 
00011 //! \file
00012 //! Windows Bitmap Struct Definitions
00013 //!
00014 //! Contains the definitions for the data structures used in
00015 //! windows bitmap files. For windows apps, they are already
00016 //! defined - but not with these names.
00017 //!
00018 //! The WINRGBQUAD, WINBITMAPFILEHEADER, WINBITMAPINFOHEADER,
00019 //! and WINBITMAPINFO structs are defined as RGBQUAD etc. in
00020 //! the windows header files. See the windows documentation
00021 //! for details.
00022 
00023 #ifndef INCL_PLWINDEFS
00024 #define INCL_PLWINDEFS
00025 
00026 typedef struct tagWINRGBQUAD
00027 {
00028   PLBYTE    rgbBlue;
00029   PLBYTE    rgbGreen;
00030   PLBYTE    rgbRed;
00031   PLBYTE    rgbReserved;
00032 } WINRGBQUAD;
00033 
00034 #pragma pack(2)
00035 typedef struct tagWINBITMAPFILEHEADER
00036 {
00037   PLWORD    bfType;
00038   PLLONG    bfSize;
00039   PLWORD    bfReserved1;
00040   PLWORD    bfReserved2;
00041   PLLONG    bfOffBits;
00042 } WINBITMAPFILEHEADER;
00043 #pragma pack()
00044 
00045 typedef struct tagWINBITMAPINFOHEADER
00046 {
00047   PLLONG   biSize;
00048   PLLONG   biWidth;
00049   PLLONG   biHeight;
00050   PLWORD   biPlanes;
00051   PLWORD   biBitCount;
00052   PLLONG   biCompression;
00053   PLLONG   biSizeImage;
00054   PLLONG   biXPelsPerMeter;
00055   PLLONG   biYPelsPerMeter;
00056   PLLONG   biClrUsed;
00057   PLLONG   biClrImportant;
00058 } WINBITMAPINFOHEADER;
00059 
00060 typedef struct tagWINBITMAPINFO
00061 {
00062   WINBITMAPINFOHEADER bmiHeader;
00063   WINRGBQUAD          bmiColors[1];
00064 } WINBITMAPINFO;
00065 
00066 typedef struct tagWINBITMAPCOREHEADER
00067 {
00068   PLLONG    bcSize; 
00069   PLWORD    bcWidth; 
00070   PLWORD    bcHeight; 
00071   PLWORD    bcPlanes; 
00072   PLWORD    bcBitCount; 
00073 } WINBITMAPCOREHEADER;
00074 
00075 /* constants for the biCompression field */
00076 #define BI_RGB        0L
00077 #define BI_RLE8       1L
00078 #define BI_RLE4       2L
00079 #define BI_BITFIELDS  3L
00080 
00081 
00082 #endif
